lead_paragraph: Former Baltimore Ravens linebacker O.J. Brigance will take his personal fight against ALS to the baseball diamond on the 77th anniversary of Lou Gehrig's farewell speech at Yankee Stadium.

headline.print_headline: Also Fighting ALS, OJ Brigance to Pay Tribute to Lou Gehrig
headline.main: Also Fighting ALS, OJ Brigance to Pay Tribute to Lou Gehrig

snippet: Former Baltimore Ravens linebacker O.J. Brigance will take his personal fight against ALS to the baseball diamond on the 77th anniversary of Lou Gehrig's farewell speech at Yankee Stadium....
